item.title: OnePlus 13 to get Apple MagSafe-like features with magnetic cases: Report - Business Standard
item.description:
OnePlus 13 to get Apple MagSafe-like features with magnetic cases: Report

Published on: January 03 2025 | Source: Business Standard

The upcoming OnePlus 13 series smartphones are set to include magnetic cases that mimic Apple‚Äôs MagSafe technology, allowing for new accessories and enhanced charging options.

  • OnePlus 13 series expected to launch on January 7, 2025.
  • The magnetic cases will be compatible with Qi2 charging standards.
  • Official cases include a "Sandstone Magnetic case" and options for "Wood Grain" and "Aramid Fiber" styles exclusive to OnePlus 13.
  • OnePlus may introduce new magnetic accessories, including a power bank already available in China.
  • Compatible with third-party wireless chargers that support Qi2 standard.
  • Expected specifications for OnePlus 13 include Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, up to 24GB RAM, and 6000mAh battery.
‚ÄúAccording to the report, the company may bring new magnetic charging accessories.‚Äù

This innovative integration of magnetic capabilities is likely to enhance the user experience of OnePlus devices and expand the range of accessories available.

item.title: Poco M7 Pro vs Vivo Y29 vs Realme 14X: Which offers the best value around ‚Çπ15,000? - Hindustan Times
item.description:

In conclusion, each smartphone offers distinct features that cater to varying user preferences, making them worthy contenders in the ‚Çπ15,000 segment.

item.title: Foreign smartphone shipments in China slump 47% in November - ETBrandEquity
item.description:
Foreign smartphone shipments in China slump 47% in November

Published On: January 3, 2025 | Source: Reuters

Shipments of foreign-branded smartphones, including Apple‚Äôs iPhone, to China fell 47.4% in November, continuing a decline from October. Apple's market share shrinks amid economic slowdown and fierce competition from Huawei, which saw a 42% sales increase. Overall phone shipments in China also dropped by 5.1% year-on-year.

  • Foreign smartphone shipments decreased to 3.04 million units from 5.769 million units year-on-year.
  • The drop follows a 44.25% decline in October.
  • Apple faces competition from local players like Huawei.
  • Consumer prices in China fell to their lowest in five months.
  • In response to declining market share, Apple cut prices by up to 500 yuan on flagship models.
"Overall phone shipments in China fell 5.1% year-on-year in November to 29.61 million handsets."

This slump highlights the increasing difficulty foreign brands face in competing within the Chinese market amid rising local competition.

item.title: Vivo X200s Tipped to Feature MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ Chipset, 1.5K Resolution Display - Gadgets 360

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S24 Series to Get Improved Fingerprint Recognition With One UI 7 Beta 3 - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S24 Might Soon Benefit from Faster Fingerprint Recognition

Publication Date: January 2, 2025 Source: Gadgets 360

The upcoming One UI 7 Beta 3 update aims to significantly increase fingerprint recognition speeds for the Samsung Galaxy S24 series, addressing user complaints regarding the sensor's performance.

  • The One UI 7 Beta 3 update is based on Android 15 and promises improved fingerprint recognition speeds.
  • Tipster Ice Universe claims the new update will bring changes to system sounds and more flexible drop-down actions.
  • The update currently is in beta testing in several countries including Germany, India, and the US.
‚ÄúNot only the sound is clearer, but also the fingerprint unlocking speed is extremely fast, which is faster than the previous version.‚Äù ‚Äî ICE UNIVERSE

In conclusion, the One UI 7 Beta 3 update is expected to roll out soon, enhancing the user experience for Galaxy S24 users seeking faster and more reliable fingerprint recognition.

item.title: LG showcases two lifestyle projectors for CES 2025 - The Hindu
item.description:
LG Unveils Two Innovative Lifestyle Projectors at CES 2025

Date: January 03, 2025
Source: The Hindu

LG on Friday showcased two lifestyle projectors, the PF600U and PF6125U, ahead of the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) 2025 starting January 7 in the U.S.

  • The PF600U integrates a projector, Bluetooth speaker, and LED mood lamp.
  • The CineBeam S (PU615U) is described as LG's smallest 4K Ultra Short Throw projector.
  • The PF600U features FHD resolution, 300 ANSI lumens, stereo speakers, and various LED mood lamp options.
  • The CineBeam S offers 4K UHD resolution with 500 ANSI lumens and extensive color space coverage.
  • Both projectors have auto screen adjustment features and support for OTT streaming via LG webOS.
The CineBeam S delivers significant color space coverage and impressive image projection capabilities.

In conclusion, LG's latest projectors showcase advancements in home entertainment technology, aiming to enhance user experience at CES 2025.

item.description:
OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R Launch Details and Specifications

Publication Date: January 7, 2025. Source: Indian Express

OnePlus is set to unveil the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R, confirming specifications and upgrades ahead of the launch. Here's what we know about these devices.

Key Points

  • The OnePlus 13 series will feature a flat design and new color options.
  • Both models will have a 6,000mAh battery with fast charging support.
  • The OnePlus 13 will have a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset; the 13R will use the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset.
  • Camera upgrades include a 50MP primary sensor on the OnePlus 13 and a rumored triple-camera system for the 13R.
  • The expected price for the OnePlus 13 is under Rs 70,000, and for the 13R, it is expected to be under Rs 50,000.

Notable Quotes or Statistics

"The OnePlus 13 is expected to receive 4 years of OS updates and 5 years of security patches."

Conclusion

The OnePlus 13 series promises significant improvements in design, performance, and camera capabilities, reaffirming OnePlus's commitment to delivering high-quality flagship devices.

item.title: Capturing The Essence Of Kashmir With The All-New vivo X200 Pro - TRAVEL + LEISURE INDIA
item.description:
Capturing The Essence Of Kashmir With The All-New vivo X200 Pro

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Travel + Leisure Asia

Explore how storyteller Maroof Culmen captured the beauty of Kashmir using the vivo X200 Pro. This smartphone not only serves as a photography tool but also as a narrative device that brings the hidden gems of the valley to life.

  • Culmen utilized various features of the vivo X200 Pro, including Portrait and Street Photography modes, to capture vibrant expressions of local life.
  • The Telephoto HyperZoom mode provided him the capability to focus on distant details, enriching the storytelling aspect of his photography.
  • Long Exposure mode allowed for dynamic shots of waterfalls and landscapes, perfectly showcasing Kashmir's natural beauty.
  • Culmen emphasized the importance of immersion in local culture to create meaningful photography that connects viewers to the region's essence.
‚ÄúThe vivo X200 Pro captures the subtle light changes‚Äîthe warmth of sunlight filtering through the trees or the coolness of the mountains. It brings every scene to life with vibrant, true-to-nature colours,‚Äù - Maroof Culmen.

This innovative smartphone empowers storytellers like Culmen to document their journeys more effectively without the burden of heavy equipment, showcasing the rich tapestry of experiences that places like Kashmir offer.

item.title: India‚Äôs share in global market capitalization eases from all-time high | Stock Market News - Mint
item.description:
India‚Äôs Share in Global Market Capitalization Dips from Peak

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Motilal Oswal Financial Services Ltd.

The last few months of 2024 saw turbulence in global equity markets, leading to a correction in stocks. India‚Äôs share in global market capitalization has decreased from 4.6% in August to 4.2% in December.

  • India's market cap share decreased from 4.6% to 4.2%.
  • This decline is attributed to overall turbulence in global equity markets.
  • Analysis by Motilal Oswal indicates a reaction to various economic factors.
"India‚Äôs share in global market capitalization has dipped to 4.2% in December from its August peak of 4.6%."

This decline signifies the challenges posed by recent market fluctuations, reflecting the broader trends affecting global equity markets.

item.title: Poco X7 5G, Poco X7 Pro India Launch Set For January 9: From Camera To Display, What We Know So Far - ABP Live
item.description:

Publication Date: January 1, 2024
Source: ABP Live

Poco is set to launch its new X7 5G smartphone series in India, featuring both the Poco X7 5G and Poco X7 Pro 5G on January 9. The phones will be available exclusively on Flipkart, and Poco is actively promoting their design and features on social media.

Don't just meet expectations; Smash them üòà #POCOX7 Series launching on 9th Jan | 5:30 PM IST on #Flipkart

  • Design: The standard X7 will have a centrally placed camera module, while the Pro will have a pill-shaped array.

  • Performance: X7 Pro will likely feature the MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra, while the base variant may use the Dimensity 7300-Ultra.
  • Battery: Pro model might include a 6,000mAh battery with 90W fast charging; standard model expected to have a 5,110mAh battery with 45W charging.
  • Display: The series will feature 6.67-inch AMOLED screens, with high refresh rates and robust protection.

Overall, the upcoming Poco X7 series appears to be a significant addition to the smartphone market, promising impressive features and specifications that cater to modern user needs.

item.title: iPhone SE4 or iPhone 16e? Here is what Apple is likely to launch in 2025 - India Today
item.description:
iPhone SE4 or iPhone 16e? Here is what Apple is likely to launch in 2025

Published On: Jan 3, 2025 | Published By: Divya Bhati

Apple is rumoured to launch a new budget iPhone, possibly named the iPhone 16e, in 2025, instead of the anticipated iPhone SE 4. Key features include an A18 series chip and a brand new modem chip.

  • The iPhone SE 4 has been speculated to be replaced by the iPhone 16e.
  • Rumors point to a launch by late March or early April 2025.
  • The device may feature design improvements such as a larger OLED display, Face ID, and enhanced performance.
  • Significant camera upgrades are expected, including a new 48-megapixel sensor.
  • Pricing in the U.S. could begin around $500, with Indian prices likely ranging from Rs 49,900 to Rs 53,900.
"Only the official launch will confirm whether it will be the iPhone SE 4 or the newly named iPhone 16e." - Divya Bhati

The anticipated upgrades signify Apple's commitment towards enhancing the budget iPhone lineup while aligning it with flagship features.

item.title: Putin's Gaming Ambition Falls Flat: Russian 'Homegrown' Consoles Can't Compete With PS5, Xbox - NDTV
item.description:
Putin's Gaming Ambition Falls Flat: Russian 'Homegrown' Consoles Can't Compete With PS5, Xbox

Date: October 2023
Source: Techspot

A little less than a year after Russian President Vladimir Putin ordered his government to develop gaming consoles, officials have admitted their devices cannot compete with established brands like PlayStation and Xbox. Despite these challenges, the goal remains to promote domestic video game products.

Key Points:

  • Russian gaming consoles are underpowered compared to PS5 and Xbox.
  • One console uses Russia's Elbrus processor, noted for its lack of competitive performance.
  • Deputy Chairman Anton Gorelkin emphasizes the need for innovation in domestic consoles.
  • Social media reactions vary from surprise to humor regarding Russia's gaming competition.
  • Putin's directive for consoles comes after major companies stopped sales to Russia due to geopolitical issues.

Notable Quotes:

"Elbrus processors are not yet at the stage of development to ensure equal competition with the PS5 and Xbox." - Anton Gorelkin
"I do remember hearing Russia saying they were going to make their own console. I didn't actually expect them to follow through." - Social media user

Conclusion:

The effort to create competitive gaming consoles in Russia faces significant technological hurdles and public skepticism, reflecting broader challenges in the region's tech industry.

item.title: 5 iPhones coming in 2025 and what to expect - India Today

item.title: Galaxy S25 Ultra rumoured to feature Corning Gorilla Armor 2 with improved anti-reflective coating - India Today
item.description:
Galaxy S25 Ultra Rumored to Feature Corning Gorilla Armor 2 with Enhanced Anti-Reflective Coating

Published On: Jan 3, 2025 By: Aman Rashid

The Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra introduced Corning's Gorilla Armor glass with a groundbreaking anti-reflective coating, enhancing visibility outdoors. Rumors suggest that the Galaxy S25 Ultra will continue this trend with Corning‚Äôs second-generation Gorilla Glass Armor, offering improved durability and reduced reflections.

  • The Galaxy S24 Ultra set a precedent with its anti-reflective coating, making it the least reflective screen in smartphone history.
  • Reliable leaker Ice Universe claims the S25 Ultra will utilize the new Gorilla Glass Armor, expected to further diminish reflections.
  • This innovation is aimed at improving user experience by saving battery life and enhancing usability in bright conditions.
  • The phone is anticipated to launch on January 22, 2025, with upgraded features including the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and possibly 16GB RAM.
‚ÄúLess reflection means the screen looks brighter without needing to crank up the brightness levels.‚Äù

The continuation of advanced glass technology in the Galaxy S25 Ultra reinforces Samsung's commitment to practical innovations that distinguish its flagship devices.

item.title: HMD Key With 6.52-Inch Screen, 4,000mAh Battery Launched: Price, Specifications - Gadgets 360
item.description:

The HMD Key was launched in select global markets, offering budget-friendly features paired with modern technology including a 4G connection and a robust battery.
